items.title: What to Know About Kataib Hezbollah, the Iraqi Militia That Held Tsurkov Captive
items.description: Kataib Hezbollah, a hard-line Iraqi militia linked to Iran, held Elizabeth Tsurkov, a citizen of Israel and Russia, hostage for more than two years.
